body_html:
@StuvX did you face any problems with pybind11?
I'm facing this issue after cloning and running pip install ./onnx
/tmp/pip-_y4wFf-build/onnx/cpp2py_export.cc:1:31: fatal error: pybind11/pybind11.h: No such file or directory
compilation terminated.
Does it require installing pybind11 from source? pip install pybind11 does not solve this for me.

body:
@StuvX did you face any problems with pybind11?
I'm facing this issue after cloning and running pip install ./onnx 
/tmp/pip-_y4wFf-build/onnx/cpp2py_export.cc:1:31: fatal error: pybind11/pybind11.h: No such file or directory
compilation terminated.
Does it require installing pybind11 from source? pip install pybind11 does not solve this for me.
